channel.title: End to "1337" speak please?
channel.description:
RATIO: 1:3 For every 1337speaker there is 3 supporters. --BEFORE REPLYING-- Leave the pointless comments. [quote="Carly"]Lol dude u realize this is total spam no wonder it got removed[/quote] positive comments wanted. [quote="Phree xp"]Best thread I have seen this week.[/quote] I posted about this about a month ago, but got deleted somehow. So im reposting. I'm sure the smart ones such as Naill, Iki, Aff etc etc. First off, its in the offical rules posted by God of Ikiliki in the annoucements section. [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,235126.0.html](LINK)[/url] Look down to rule six:
We don't make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use "you" not "u", we use "why" not "y" etc.
First off, this doesn't mean proper grammar such as full stops and caps etc etc. This also doesn't include spelling mistakes such as; i could spell someone's name wrong or a word i might find difficut. Everyone has difficuty spelling some/most words. Its life. What it is putting the blame on is "1337" speak. Which most people find hard to read. [hr] Also, another point is being rude to everyone? Its increasing! We've got to stop it if we are going to become even bigger. That person, fellix or what ever his name is, is very rude to newbies which is going to put them off.
We respect each other and other communities. We don't flame each other or other communities. We don't fight on the forums.
Well thanks, Sam.

item.title: End to "1337" speak please?
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[quote=“veki94, post:41, topic:175064”]If they don’t punish it , why do they post it as a “rule”?
I don’t say it’s bannable,I say since it’s a rule they should give a warning, punishment or something.[/quote]

I guess we are stuck with; It will rarely get punished.

Read full topic

item.title: End to "1337" speak please?
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:36, topic:175064”]There is a rule already, if they don’t follow it it’s their own choice.
Their own problem if they’re getting a punishment.

We’ve got to stop it if we are going to become even bigger.

O please not more.
Mopar’s database will run over.[/quote]
Would be cool… just like every summer a mass wave of banned rs newbies floods with topics in the wrong section… I hope you plan a summer holiday Iki.

Read full topic

if their topic close simple. No one can understand it. This happens alot in help threads.

1u1 1f y0u c4n7 r34d 17 d0n’7 b3 0n t3h intr0n37.

Iki delete that and slap a warn sticker on his fore head
[/quote]

And honesty, do you think moparscapians these days really care about rules?

item.title: End to "1337" speak please?
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[quote=“Ikilivion, post:17, topic:175064”]You both need to get a life, i’ve got something to fight back with. You have a signature that quotes.

Varrock Pk 5

That’s not full technique, please use.

Varrock Player Killing 5.[/quote]

Not 1337 speak. Its abrevation.

wasabiie:

Flamming because how I talk? I say you’re probably the most immature one here.

People who talk like usually(as i can see you don’t) are the immature ones. And if you were trying to make a joke, i can understand that but does it look like this topic is for joking?

Ikilivion:

God of Ikiliki knows you? You’re very hard! Nobody is going to respect you because he knows you. You’re another noob who is trying to become a moderator to me.

Thats your point of view.
And if you could understand just a bit over basic English communication you would understand that what i men’t was that iki knows me; meaning he knows what im like. Not what you men’t.

[quote=“veki94, post:22, topic:175064”][quote author=I Samn I link=topic=235564.msg2007559#msg2007559 date=1200953871]

1u1 1f y0u c4n7 r34d 17 d0n’7 b3 0n t3h intr0n37.

Iki delete that and slap a warn sticker on his fore head
[/quote]
Why would he delete it,there isn’t a rule " no 1337 spelling"[/quote]

There is accutly, just read the beginning part of the rule.[quote=“Ikilivion, post:24, topic:175064”]1337, This is also the name of some servers and cache, that ends our topic. You’re both noobs with 2 people to 10,000 people.[/quote]
One or two people CAN make a difference. So STFU.

Read full topic
